description: Average amount and fraud count by account type
natural_language: Show the average transaction amount and total number of fraudulent transactions grouped by account type
measures: SUM(CASE WHEN isFraud = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fraud_count

natural_language: Show daily fraud transaction counts over time
measures: SUM(CASE WHEN isFraud = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fraud_count
